testCases.explanation: Jump 1 step from index 0 to 1, then 3 steps to last index
Always arrive at index 3 with value 0; cannot proceed to last index
Single element array; already at the last index
Jump 1 step from index 0 to reach the last index
Jump 2 steps from index 0 directly to the last index

description: You are given an integer array nums. You are initially positioned at the array's first index, and each element represents your maximum jump length at that position. Return true if you can reach the last index, or false otherwise.

examples.explanation: Jump 1 step from index 0 to 1, then 3 steps to the last index.
